variants.Description in input context: This variant is located in the ATP6V0A2 gene, causing an amino acid change from arginine to tryptophan at position 388.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293T cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 70% for the variant NM_139485.5:c.1163C>T (p.R388W).

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type cDNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: T-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 85% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 60% on day 7.
